attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to Jerusalem.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that having a separate national anthem to the United Kingdom will magnify the sense of patriotism in the country.
attributes.background: The national anthem for England should be replaced with Jerusalem but keep it the same for the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here: https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
